nodes.text: Maneros was a bald male Abyssin who served the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War against the Sith Empire. During the war, he worked selling stimulants on the planet Quesh from a stall in the Republic Operational Headquarters. Maneros wore brown clothing and made use of a datapad while at his stall, which was exposed to Quesh's toxic atmosphere. He had green skin and an orange eye.
Maneros first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game he serves as a Republic stims vendor on the planet Quesh.
